mapper.select: SELECT id FROM eqpt_material WHERE sn = #{sn} AND bn = #{bn} AND id = #{id}
SELECT outId FROM eqpt_outrepository WHERE outId LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{outId},'%'))
SELECT DISTINCT ID_ AS outId FROM w_lysqq WHERE ID_ NOT IN (SELECT outInfo FROM eqpt_outrepository)
SELECT DISTINCT ID_ AS outId FROM w_xsfh WHERE ID_ NOT IN (SELECT outInfo FROM eqpt_outrepository)
SELECT DISTINCT wdbh AS outId FROM w_xsfhtzd

SELECT w_lysqq.F_WLBH AS materialId,w_lysqq.F_WLMC AS materialName,w_lysqq.F_GGXH AS spec,w_lysqq.F_XQSL AS outNum,w_lysqq.F_WLMC AS sn,(eqpt_material.unit) AS unit,eqpt_material.remark AS remark FROM eqpt_material,w_lysqq WHERE REF_ID_ = #{wdbh} AND eqpt_material.id = w_lysqq.F_WLBH

SELECT w_cpmx20.F_WLBH AS materialId,w_cpmx20.F_WLMC AS materialName,w_cpmx20.F_GGXH AS spec,w_cpmx20.F_XQSL AS outNum,w_cpmx20.F_WLMC AS sn,(eqpt_material.unit) AS unit,eqpt_material.remark AS remark FROM eqpt_material,w_cpmx20 WHERE REF_ID_ = #{wdbh} AND eqpt_material.id = w_cpmx20.F_WLBH

SELECT w_xsfhtzd.wlbh AS materialId,w_xsfhtzd.wlmc AS materialName,w_xsfhtzd.ggxh AS spec,w_xsfhtzd.xqsl AS outNum,w_xsfhtzd.pch_xlh AS sn,(eqpt_material.unit) AS unit,eqpt_material.remark AS remark FROM eqpt_material,w_xsfhtzd WHERE wdbh = #{wdbh} AND eqpt_material.id = w_xsfhtzd.wlbh
